# The xmlwriter extension

Configure the `xmlwriter` extension.

This extension provides support for libxml xmlWriter API.

## EXT_XMLWRITER

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_XMLWRITER_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
